thank-you-message: Thank you for visiting us at Secret Sauce Summit 2023 and participating in our survey
opening-message: It is <blue>not a coincodence</blue> that you ended up here.
opening-message-two: Your organization's journey to net zero <blue>begins here.</blue>
what-are-you-getting: Today you received <blue>Eucalyptus seed</blue> as a token of our appreciation.
what-are-you-getting-two: We believe that <blue>Action speaks louder than words</blue>, which is why we need your help.
what-are-you-getting-three: We would greatly appreciate it if you could plant the seeds, and <blue>here's how.</blue>
what-are-you-getting-four: Please nurture the seeds and <blue>watch it grow</blue>, little by little.
what-are-you-getting-five: If the seeds are planted and grown, it is estimated that <blue>one tree</blue> will capture <blue>34 kg of CO2 annually.</blue>
what-are-you-getting-six: We will need <blue>135 trees (covering 0.75 Rais)</blue> to capture the emissions of <blue>a single passenger car annually.</blue>
what-are-you-getting-seven: Though the effect of each individual effort is small,  <blue>together we can slowly make meaningful steps</blue> towards a greener world.
what-are-you-getting-eight: So please join us in accelerating the change towards a <blue>better future</blue> through our Expert Decision Platform and Gideon One's suite of solutions
thinkerfint-title: If you want to find out more about what our <blue>Expert Decision Platform</blue> can do, click on the tab below
thinkerfint-header: Elevate Your Business with Decision Intelligence
thinkerfint-desc: Overcome Business Complexity: Increase acceleration, precision and efficiency with Thinker solutions.
gideon-title: If you want to learn more about GideonOne's product offerings, please click on the tab below
gideon-header: One-stop solution for your organization's net zero journey.
gideon-desc: Our dedication to assisting your business in achieving its ESG goals as easily and swiftly as possible, to contribute to the sustainability of Thailand and the world
